htmlform.formName: HMIS 003 HIV Care ART Card - Clinical Assessment
htmlform.formDescription: A visit for a client for clinical assessment

div.h1: HMIS HIV 003:HIV Care/ART Card - Clinical Assessment

obs.answerLabels: N - Normal, MAM - Moderate Acute Malnutrition, SAM - Severe Acute Malnutrition, SAMO - Severe Acute Malnutrition with Oedema, O - Overweight/Obese
TF - Therapeutic Feeding (F75 F100 RUTF), SF - Supplementary Feeding, IYCF - Infant and Young Child Feeding Counselling ( < 2yrs), NC - Nutrition Counselling only (if > 2yrs)

obs.answerLabel: NPB - Not pregnant or not breast feeding

div.div: Intention to conceive in the next three months

obs.answerLabels: No evidence of Malignancy, Not Applicable, Suspicious of Malignancy, Not eligible

1 - No signs,2 - Presumptive, 3C - TB Diagnosed - Clinically diagnosed, 3G - TB Diagnosed - Gene Xpert, 3L - TB Diagnosed - TB LAM,3M - TB Diagnosed -TB Microscopy, 3X - TB Diagnosed - Chest Xray, 3O - TB Diagnosed - Others, 4 - Tb Rx - Currently on TB treatment, 5 - Completed TB Treatment
H0-Never Initiated,H1-On INH,H2-Defaulted,H3-Taken off due to side effects,H4-Completed

obs.answerLabel: 13 - Cough or shortness of breath > 1 week
14 - Fever, chills or night sweats > 1 week
15 - Red/purple or dark spots on skin

div.div: Advanced Disease Status and WHO Clinical Stage

obs.answerLabels: 1 - No Adv. Disease, 2 - Suspected Adv. Disease, 3a - Confirmed Adv. Disease CD4 < 200, 3b - Confirmed Adv. Disease - Pos CrAg, 3c - Confirmed Adv. Disease - Pos TB, 3d - Confirmed Adv. Disease - WHO Stage 3/4, 3e - Confirmed Adv. Disease - Child < 5 Yrs

div.div: Hepatitis B status and Syphilis Status

obs.answerLabels: 1 - No symptoms, 2 - Symptomatic Non-Reactive, 3 - Symptomatic Reactive, 4 - Symptomatic Reactive and treated
Positive, Negative, Not Done, Not Applicable
Reactive, Non-reactive, Not Done, Not Applicable
Positive, Negative, Not Done, Not Applicable
FBIM - Facility Based Individual Management, FBG - Facility Based Group, FTDR - Fast-Track Drug Refills, CDDP - Community Drug Distribution Point, CCLAD - Community Client-Led ART Delivery
R - Drug Refill ONLY, C - Clinical Assessment/Drug refill and/or Tests/Investigations

obs.answerLabel: NPB - Not pregnant or not breast feeding

div.label: Intention to conceive in the next three months

obs.answerLabels: No evidence of Malignancy, Not Applicable, Suspicious of Malignancy, Not eligible
